code: import{gsap}from'gsap';import $ from'jquery';export function runCursorCertificateAnimation(){var cursors=$(".cursors");var followers=$(".cursor-followers");var posX=0,posY=0,mouseX=0,mouseY=0;gsap.to({},{repeat:-1,onRepeat:function onRepeat(){posX+=(mouseX-posX)/9;posY+=(mouseY-posY)/9;gsap.set(followers,{left:posX-20,top:posY-20});gsap.set(cursors,{left:mouseX,top:mouseY});},duration:0.016});$(document).on("mousemove",function(e){mouseX=e.pageX;mouseY=e.pageY;});var addCursorListeners=function addCursorListeners(){var awardBodyCerts=$(".award-body .cert");awardBodyCerts.on("mouseenter",function(){cursors.addClass("active");followers.addClass("active");});awardBodyCerts.on("mouseleave",function(){cursors.removeClass("active");followers.removeClass("active");});};addCursorListeners();}
